===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A brown to blackish-brown pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to regulate menstruation, nourish blood, restore the normal flow of [[qi]] and relieve pain in the treatment of menstrual disorders or dysmenorrhea with distending pain in the lower abdomen and aching in the loins and legs due to ''deficiency'' of ''yin-blood'', stagnation of [[qi]] and blood stasis".

Nujin pills have the following herbal ingredients:
